item.title: Report E-2024120010
item.description:
Report E-2024120010

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-04T12:24:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-25
  • City: GREENWOOD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately five (5) gallons of Acetone was released from one (1) 5-gallon metal pail due to improperly loaded freight. The release impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area. The granular absorbents and spent material were placed in one (1) 5-gallon poly drum, while the original container was placed in one (1) 10-gallon drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
